message.content:
cs.DC, cs.LG, cs.DB, cs.SE, cs.CY 

The paper discusses a framework for automating characterization and knowledge discovery in Hadoop deployments using machine learning techniques. This involves analyzing large amounts of performance data and optimizing configurations for cost-effectiveness. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing). The paper also discusses the use of machine learning techniques, which suggests that it could also belong to cs.LG (Machine Learning). Additionally, the paper deals with database systems (Hadoop) and software engineering (performance tuning), which could place it in cs.DB (Databases) and cs.SE (Software Engineering) respectively. Finally, the paper discusses the use of Cloud services, which could place it in cs.CY (Computers and Society).
